name: Toy Block Boom - Match 3 Game
description:
The super cute tapping & matching game on mobile today! Work your way through matching two or more blocks of the same color and creating boosters to clear levels!

Features:
● Tap blocks Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Tap blocks of the same color to collect them!
● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
● Over 800 levels with exciting puzzles!
● Amazing boosters and gifts are pretty helpful along the way!

Toy Block Boom is completely free to play and you can play the game without Wi-Fi as well. Now enjoy your Toy Block Boom adventure!
